title: Minka-Aire F588-SP-WH Ultra-Max 54 Inch Ceiling Fan in White Finish
features: DESIGN: The Minka-Aire Ultra-Max Contractor indoor ceiling fan is designed in a White finish and Five White Blades
BULB: Light Kit not included. This fan is Light Kit Compatible with Minka Aire Universal Light Kits sold separately
INCLUDED: RCS212 - Three-speed hand-held remote with full-range light dimming, Forward and Reverse function, WCS212 wall control and 6" Downrod
MOTOR: Conveniently quiet, 3 speed - reversible motor. Run Summer and Winter to aid in rotating air and cutting down on energy costs.
DIMENSIONS: Measures 12'' from the ceiling to the lowest point of the fan with the included 6" downrod. This Contractor Ceiling Fan has a blade sweep diameter of 54'' with 14° Blade Pitch
ADDITIONAL: Requires Bond hub BD-1000 (sold separately) to work with Amazon Alexa or Google Home.
description: We proudly present our most comprehensive and exciting Collection of ceiling fans ever. Within these pages you will find an unparalleled combination of form, function, and design. From classic to contemporary styling, all our fans have been engineered for superior performance and to provide maximum comfort in even the largest rooms. Something for every décor and budget.
